name: Team Farfalle - Monkey Business
description:
Team Farfalle's submission for the March 2023 Spartasoft Game Jam!

You're a monkey getting up in people's business.

Created in 48 hours by:

Antonio Capozzoli

Andrew Vogt

Madison Kiewski

Garrett Simpson

Andrew Tran

Ben Finkelstein

Controls:

WASD - move

space - jump

Mouse1 - Fire squirt bottle

1 - mustard

2 - ketchup

3 - equip nothing

e - pick up

f - throw

g - drop

Assets Credits:

Delicious Handrawn font - Agung Rohmat (Google Fonts)

Rubik Iso font - NaN, Luke Prowse (Google Fonts)

Fast Food Restaurant Kit - Brick Project Studio (Unity Asset Store)
